resources.string: Unable to connect to the Internet
This app is developed by: Osman Nasib Ali Ahmed, Kashmala Hafeez Sheikh, Sofia Ibn El Moujdi Troger, Suleyman Mert Boyar, Syed Adam Hussainy, Sakaria Abdi Ahmed

The purpose of this app is to show the electricity price for a timeframe, and show the cost for common appliances during the different timeframes. The home screen shows the current spot price for the user, while the electricity screen shows the electricity price for the current day and the chosen region. The appliances screen shows the price of using the appliance that was chosen as a graph or a table. And in the settings, you can change the region.
